name: World of Wonders Kremlin Palace

reviews.text: I went with My husband & 4 year old daughter. The room was clean & comfortable. The hotel staff were too busy to pay any attention to guests - it felt like a conveyor belt especially at meal times.
reviews.title: Definately not 5 Star

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best al la carte restaurant was the turkish one. Good service & good food. The Mexican was autrocious, guests actually walked out when served the starter - it really was bad food & bad service.The italian was very mediocre & there were plates of dirty dishes left everywhere.
reviews.title: Dont bother staying here!

reviews.text: The food in the main restaurant was extremley disappointing - But if you are a big salad fan you will be delighted, there really is a big selection of this & it is very good.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel !

reviews.text: The pools are clean & so are the surrounding areas of the hotel. It feels like you are in a small town, the entertainment was good.
reviews.title: wonderful

reviews.text: The thing that impressed us the most was the kiddies club - they were exceptional especially Naz - she was Brilliant. They had loads of activities for the kids to do, and my daughter absolutely loved it.
reviews.title: What a relief!!

reviews.text: we just stayed 14 days in Antalya trying different hotels, we stayed here and after that Topkapi next door, and both was great yes it si many Russian people in Kremlin but that was a pluss, Girls was hot and food was fantastic, and rooms ,were clean, l have no idea why these people make up lies like that, maybe the other hotel owner or l do not know what ever the reason they would lie
reviews.title: This is a Great hotel, I don't know what these people talking about

reviews.text: it is a wonderful resort, we loved it
reviews.title: fantastic holiday

reviews.text: ok the rooms weren't quite 5 star compared to english hotels.
reviews.title: don't think may be good

reviews.text: i went with my friend and her wee boy aged 7. and it was the best holiday i have had yet.
reviews.title: Disappointing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the rooms were pretty basic but they were cleaned everyday. and if you needed anything done all you had to do was phone reception and they came and fixed it.
reviews.title: Don't go there if you are British

reviews.text: it is a 3 * hotel with lots of improvements ;good water slides but slipery floor,good pool,great entertainment staff ,noisy restaurant(the staff would hit the plates of a metal container to remove the ramining food ) ,babys yelling-forks dropping-people chewing atmosfere...see photos
reviews.title: so&so

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is vast and can take 2500 guests of all nationalities.
reviews.title: Not A Bad Hotel But Not Perfect
Not 5 star!
reviews.text: The staff are freindly and helpful,but are only paid 22 ytl a day. They work very hard for it, so are glad of tips and you do get a better service by tipping.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went for Christmas and New year. Christmas eve was great - there was santa for the kids and then a gala meal and entertainment in the ballroom.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: New years eve is big in Turkey and the hotels fill up with party loving locals, the entertainment therefor is more aimed at them than us but it was fun..The gala meal a little drawn out but with 2000 to serve it would be. The hotel felt too full for our liking and we wouldnt go in the summer months when its always busy. The locals for the most part left on New years day and the Hotel returned to a more sedate pace and the noise levels dropped. This hotel like others holds seminars and conferences - 1000 men arrived on the 2nd of Jan.
reviews.title: Avoid this hotel !!!

reviews.text: Before deciding on the hotel for our family holiday I read the reviews & they were very mixed so we did not know what to expect.We went on a 4 day all inclusive package & it was just wonderful.Service was great,entertainment first class,food was excellent & the facilities, health club, restaurants & pools were too good to be true.A great holiday for the kids & us would definately go back next year in June just before the hoards arrive!!The rooms were just a tad in need of attention would be the only minor complaint!
reviews.title: Great Hotel for the whole family

reviews.text: We went unsure of what to expect but we had a great time. The boys went to kids club once but purely because there was so much to do wanted to stay with us. The only downsides on our experience were that the Turkish restaurant where we went to lunch a couple of times forgot to serve our food, the beach wasn't that great and the obvious queue jumpers which you have expect and in our eyes we were in no hurry! We really enjoyed the food, the kids loved the slides, we loved the jetty with the large bean bags, the family room was great, seperate room for the boys both rooms with tv, the activities were good, the entertainment was also very good some of the evening shows were amazing. An all round great holiday. Recomment turkish bath in the spa and do it on the first day if you can! Definatley recommend.
reviews.title: Fabulous holiday and would definatley go again
brillliant
reviews.text: Just come back from hotel Topkapi it was all you could have wished for rooms very clean unlike engish hotels.Service excellant . The could not have done more for you we used the Kremlin Palace pool more so because it was just a little bit quieter than the Topkapi the Animation team were so friendly and would leave you alone if you didnt want to do anything or if you joined in made you have fun. Showtime was better in the Kresmlin Palace was also better than the Topkapi . Al la carte restaurants were very good service excellant they filled your glasses up without being asked which was good
The only downside was the ignorant Russians no please or thankkyous and just pushed in when the could but the bar staff would usually serve the english first .Looking forward to going again next year
reviews.title: Well worth the money

reviews.text: mother *& daughter fro m Glos.
reviews.title: A fantastic hotel, alot for your money

aka: World Of Wonders Kremlin Palace Hotel Antalya
description: We have built the WOW Kremlin Palace in Antalya in accordance with the original so that you do not have to travel thousands of kilometers to see it, and so that you can explore this structure which is the residence of the Russian Tsars here. You will begin your holiday at the "Resurrection Gate" at the entrance to Kremlin Square, and will return as if you have been reborn. We invite all of you to this holiday resort which has come out of fairytales - the unique Kremlin Palace where the splendour of the architecture combines with the tranaquility of your holiday. Our resort is 20 km from Antalya Airport and 17 km from the center of Antalya Lara. Free Services: Welcome cocktail, foods & local and standard imported drinks, mini bar, safety deposit box (in rooms), fitness center, Turkish Bath, sauna, squash, pugy club (mini club), internet cafe, daytime sporting activities & night time shows, 30 minute group tennis lessons, tennis rackets, catamaran, windurfing and sailing (all require certificates), canoing, first trial dive at the swimming pool, towels, sombreros and chaise longues, hammocks and cushions, wireless internet access from the lobby. Services Subject to a Fee: Room Service (24 hours), special wine menus at the A la carte restaurants, premium alcoholic drinks, Sushi Restaurant, Mangal Park, El Sombrero estaurant, La Gondola Restaurant, doctor, nurse, massage, beauty center, hairdresser, tennis school, tennis court lighting, mini football and basketball pitches lighting, sailing school, diving school, laundrette & dry cleaning (ironing), babysitter, telephone & fax, motorised water sports, the pavillions (specially equipped private relaxation areas on the beach), bowling, Pay TV, internet access in the rooms.
